Interfaces

\Jasny\HttpMessage

Name Description
DerivedAttributeInterface A derived attribute calculates it's value based on any request parameters.
EmitterInterface Interface for an emitter
GlobalEnvironmentInterface Interface that ServerRequest or Response can interact with the global environment
HeadersInterface HTTP messages consist of requests from a client to a server and responses from a server to a client. This interface defines the methods for common headers class to each.
